title: 有感觉僵尸很可爱的吗
author: 木生藥

replies.author: FrantGwo
replies.txt_content: 僵尸那肯定可爱

replies.author: PercyDan
replies.txt_content: 没有，感觉AI太笨

replies.author: FloatingBlocks
replies.txt_content:
反正不可怕就对了
要是不烦我就可爱

replies.author: Cool_TuDou
replies.txt_content: 僵尸感觉很笨的样子

replies.author: 迷灬离
replies.txt_content: AI很傻啊

replies.author: 无谓z
replies.txt_content: 然而并没有

replies.author: 屑-帽-快-爬
replies.txt_content:
麻将的生物都很可爱a
火云邪神赛高！

replies.author: youtoto
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: asdadsadad
replies.txt_content: 有点 但是感觉看见就想杀掉 不知道为啥

replies.author: hyd77778888
replies.txt_content: 我被他们打死了好几次，你觉得呢？

replies.author: 一只傻轻语
replies.txt_content: 当你转角遇到爱的时候就不会这么认为了

replies.author: PTSD∝吝啬唐
replies.txt_content: 加个娘化包

replies.author: 用户NJW
replies.txt_content: 并没有但是那些觉得可怕的我是真的没想到

replies.author: VSdadadada
replies.txt_content: 其实僵尸寻路AI很强的，可以说是所有怪物里寻路AI最强的，但是萌吗？

replies.author: aa27460
replies.txt_content: 行走的饱食度能不可爱吗？

replies.author: PassedBook
replies.txt_content: 我刚玩的时候可害怕了

replies.author: 小法in3
replies.txt_content: 虽然你水的很明显，但我还要说一句腐肉不错

replies.author: 木大攻
replies.txt_content:
并不觉得、、
倒是觉得丑+呆

replies.author: 君忆
replies.txt_content: 娘化的更可爱

replies.author: WYL0zhu
replies.txt_content: 我怎么不觉得呢。
可爱呀 毕竟加了mod以后他们都是一刀就没了 太可怜了
